Computer.name: _radiate Battlestation
Computer.file: Ok. Since the incident with Xenon, I'm going to start using passwords that are easier to remember. Until I have a spare moment, I'm changing my tablet password to be the same as my Smoke profile password.

Hey, R4D!
I know you've been just DYING to get your grubby mitts all over this piece of teck I told you about, so here it is!
Using it is as easy as 3.14! just run it with admin priveledges and it reveals all your super-secret synced devices.
If you can fix up some shroud to protect yourself from it, Don't be stingy! Share with me!
I'll need to find a loophole in it for the next time you want me to recover your tablet. ;)
Nice taste, btw.
N I C E.
LOL, x
